definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
Qiaotou or Chiaotou township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
either end of a bridge/a bridgehead
Qiaotou or Chiaotou township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
either end of a bridge/a bridgehead
Hongqiao, the name of numerous entities, notably a major airport in Shanghai, and a district in Tianjin
Lugou Bridge or Marco Polo Bridge in southwest of Beijing, the scene of a conflict that marked the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War 抗日戰爭|抗日战争[Kang4 Ri4 Zhan4 zheng1]

sentences.english: The travellers were dismayed to find the bridge had been wash away.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者们发现桥被冲跑了，很沮丧。

sentences.english: In the middle of the bridge,his old car spluttered out.
sentences.chinese: 在过桥走到桥中间时，他的那辆破车劈啪响着熄了火。

sentences.english: The new bridge over the railroad tracks eliminated danger in cros, sing.
sentences.chinese: 这座新垮越铁轨的桥免除了越过铁轨时的危险。

sentences.english: The modified calculation about cable's angle and force of Gonghe bridge is done.
sentences.chinese: 对公和桥拉索的索力和倾角进行了垂度修正计算。

sentences.english: Among all the bridges, the most popular among tourists are the hanging bridges.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的桥中，最受旅游者欢迎的就是绳索吊桥。

sentences.english: The only access to the town is across the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 到镇上唯一的通路是经过那座桥。

sentences.english: The technology of line reinforced by the temporary beam in the D pattern and container bridge jacking has been widely applied.
sentences.chinese: 型便梁加固线路顶进箱桥施工技术已得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: West Lake has a Sai Tai, breakwaters repair a Form 6 beautiful bridge.
sentences.chinese: 湖西部有一西堤，堤上修有六座造形优美的桥。

sentences.english: The results of the test show that this pavement in Beijiang has a good durability of fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 北江桥采用改性沥青铺装是成功的。

sentences.english: And here is another, another image by Evans of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这是他拍的另一张桥的图片。

sentences.english: The bridge were built by stayers since Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是广东的务工佣人建的。

sentences.english: He dived from the bridge and rescued the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他从桥上跳入水中，救起溺水的孩子。

sentences.english: You may have heard terms like rear axle ratio or final drive ratio.
sentences.chinese: 你可能已经学过后桥减速比或主减速比。

sentences.english: Standing on the bridge, he could see the river waves sparkling in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 站在桥上，他可以看见河水在月光下闪耀。

sentences.english: The bridge is four meters across.
